User¶

Endpoints¶

Resource

Operation

Description

Create User

POST /api/user/create

Create user

Update User

POST /api/user/update

Update user

Reference¶

POST /api/user/create¶

Create user

Example request:

POST /api/user/create HTTP/1.1
Host: credmgr.jesassn.org
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

username=spaz&password=password&admin=true

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted
Content-Type: application/json

 {
     "success": "Created user: 'spaz' successfully!",
     "error": null,
     "userExists": false,
     "user": {
         "id": 1,
         "username": "spaz",
         "admin": true,
         "created": 01/06/2020 02:28:45 PM CST,
         "created_by": "root",
         "updated": 01/06/2020 02:28:45 PM CST,
         "updated_by": "root"
     }
 }
Form Parameters

  • username – username, case-insensitive

  • password – password

  • admin – enables/disables the user’s ability to create users and see other users’ apps

Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status Codes

  • 202 Accepted – The user was created successfully

  • 409 Conflict – The user already exists

  • 400 Bad Request – The posted transaction was invalid.

POST /api/user/update¶

Update user

Example request:

POST /api/user/update HTTP/1.1
Host: credmgr.jesassn.org
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

username=spaz&password=password&admin=true

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted
Content-Type: application/json

 {
     "success": "Updated user: 'spaz' successfully!",
     "error": null,
     "userExists": false,
     "user": {
         "id": 1,
         "username": "spaz",
         "admin": true,
         "created": 01/06/2020 02:28:45 PM CST,
         "created_by": "root",
         "updated": 01/06/2020 02:28:45 PM CST,
         "updated_by": "root"
     }
 }
Form Parameters

  • username – username, case-insensitive

  • password – password

  • admin – enables/disables the user’s ability to create users and see other users’ apps

Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status Codes

  • 202 Accepted – The user was updated successfully

  • 409 Conflict – The user already exists

  • 400 Bad Request – The posted transaction was invalid.
